entry.description: Description: A supplementary check in for CR#437510368 (BLL unit test part) Change Type: CR Change #: 437510368 Reviewed by: MeiWei, Gavin Review ID: 32915 Approved by: John K. Designer Testing: Pass TABLE build on release and 4.37_rel; Add one BLL unit test case to cover the case. Testing Impact: LDP IPv6 single-stack or dual stack with directed-and-targeted hello type only.
